text: Naa ʋoluma é loni kpɛdɛgi ɠobaʋɛ Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI zei ʋɛlɛi laaʋɛ, é minazeɠegi niinɛ ti yɔɠɔzu ta Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI, é minazeɠe ga toɠa ɠɛ ga wooɠɛɠila nu Ɠɔoɠɔ GALAGI ʋɛ, é ɠolo naa ná-deveiti bɛ, ta ná-tɔgiti, naa ʋɛɛ ná-kalagiti ba ga yii pɛ, ta é sɛʋɛi naa zu vaiti kpein pilɛ kɛɛwotii zu. Nuɓusɛi pɛ ge lɔɔni minazeɠegi naa zu.
